promo_card_click.description: Recorded when there is a click on the promo card cta

promo_card_dismiss.description: Recorded when the promo card is dismissed

promo_card_impression.description: Recorded when the promo card is visible

widgets_lists_change_display.description: Whether the lists widget is enabled. Matches the `widgets.lists.enabled` pref

widgets_lists_impression.description: Recorded when the list widget is viewable on a users screen

widgets_lists_user_event.description: Details which user action has occurred. It can be one of the following: list_copy, list_create, list_edit, list_delete, task_create, task_edit task_delete and task_completed

widgets_timer_change_display.description: Whether the timer widget is enabled. Matches the `widgets.focusTimer.enabled` pref

widgets_timer_impression.description: Recorded when the timer widget is viewable on a users screen

widgets_timer_toggle_notification.description: Whether the timer widget's notification pref is enabled. Matches the `widgets.focusTimer.showSystemNotifications` pref

widgets_timer_user_event.description: Details which user action has occurred. It can be one of the following: timer_set, timer_play, timer_pause, timer_reset, timer_toggle_focus, timer_toggle_break, timer_end
